description: After meeting online and quickly moving in together, Timarrie Baker, cannot stand how messy his roommate Colby Tucker is any longer!  He finally decides to confront him, asking him to move out. Aggression arises between them and it isn't long before they are letting their frustrations out on each other. Get ready for the most intense 'make up sex' yet, with hardcore cock sucking, intense ass licking and explosive orgasms, leaving things even messier than before!
title: Grudge Fuck, Scene #01
